title: Vestal Transom Watch
description:
[ VESTAL TRANSOM: WATERPROOF ]
The Transom Waterproof has a clean, fashionable and ultra-thin design enabling the watch to be worn comfortably under a wetsuit while surfing or under a dress shirt while at work. The Transom’s slim design makes it very light weight and at 6.5mm thick it is the thinnest metal case in our collection. Its case is made of solid marine grade stainless steel coupled with a mineral crystal creating a combination that increases water resistance in and out of the water. The 24mm wide polyurethane custom strap includes our patent pending OKTOLOK technology securing the strap to your wrist.

SPECIFICATIONS:
CASE: 42MM WIDE 316L STAINLESS STEEL 
BAND: 24MM WIDE POLYURETHANE
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL
CRYSTAL: HARDENED MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 12 HOUR PREMIUM DIGITAL WITH DATE
WATER RESISTANCE: WATER PROOF
WRIST: MEDIUM
OTHER:
EL BACKLIGHT
ULTRA THIN
WATERPROOF
